message.raw:
newer versions of cygwin don't link in the new/delete support functions
when compiling with gcc (older versions did, though). added an explicit
-lstdc++ to make sure this gets linked in.
message.html:
newer versions of cygwin don't link in the new/delete support functions
when compiling with gcc (older versions did, though). added an explicit
-lstdc++ to make sure this gets linked in.
